H0.text: The turtle that started first is fastest in a turtle race where each turtle walks a 3‑meter track one at a time.

H1.text: The turtle that finished first is fastest when each turtle walks a 3‑meter track one at a time in a turtle race.

H2.text: The turtle that took the shortest time is fastest in a turtle race where each turtle walks one 3‑meter track at a time.

H3.text: The turtle that took the longest time is fastest in a turtle race where each turtle walks a 3‑meter track and the turtles walk one at a time.

A4.text: Likewise, if 320 kilometres are travelled in 4 hours, the average speed is also 80 kilometres per hour.

A5.text: the average speed of an object in an interval of time is the distance travelled by the object divided by the duration of the interval
